mapper.insert: INSERT INTO housekeeping.payment_callback (class_if, class_if_sub, od_sub, data_id, process_date, process_time, response_id, auth_code, last_pan, payment_no, purchase, amount, err_reason, name, tel, phone, address, email, invoice_num, remark, smile_id, `foreign`, verify_number, mid_smile_pay) VALUES (#{pc.classIf}, #{pc.classIfSub}, #{pc.odSob}, #{pc.dataId}, #{pc.processDate}, #{pc.processTime}, #{pc.responseId}, #{pc.authCode}, #{pc.lastPan}, #{pc.paymentNo}, #{pc.purchase}, #{pc.amount}, #{pc.errReason}, #{pc.name}, #{pc.tel}, #{pc.phone}, #{pc.address}, #{pc.email}, #{pc.invoiceNum}, #{pc.remark}, #{pc.smileId}, #{pc.foreign}, #{pc.verifyNumber}, #{pc.midSmilePay})
